Chapter 8 What’s next? Now with this very rudimentary foundation underneath you we will embark upon a very long journey—the journey to learn how to analyze data with R and RStudio. In the following chapters you will learn how to program in R from creating compelling graphics, manipulating data, and performing statistical tests. In the next chapter we will dive right into working with data. We will begin by learning how to read data into R. Then, we will work through a first visual analysis after which we will focus on skills used in general data manipulation.
